Description: This session is intended for early-stage investigators to acquire skills and develop key strategies to avoid pitfalls and develop alternative tactics to enhance the probability of success in the pursuit of their first independent research position. We have recruited an expert panel of established investigators with invaluable experience on navigating a successful career in cancer research. This session is designed specifically for those who have already made the transition from trainee to the next career stage inside and outside of academia. This is an absolute must-attend session for all early-stage investigators.
Location: Junior Ballroom F - Rosen Centre Hotel
SearchResultBody: PAS03. How to Design a Successful Career Path in Cancer Research: The Dos and Don’ts for Early-Stage Investigators
SearchResultFooter: Junior Ballroom F - Rosen Centre Hotel
Title: How to Design a Successful Career Path in Cancer Research: The Dos and Don’ts for Early-Stage Investigators
